name: Loop Labs
description:
Time Travel attempt #037 was unsuccessful.

Less than unsuccessful actually...

You seem to have trapped yourself in a time loop.

Repair the Time Machine to break the loop!

Controls MOVEWASDPICKUPEDROPFCLEAR TABLECRESTART LEVELR

Look at the tasks to see what you have to build next.

Place the items on the Red crafting table.

Drop the items off at the time machine to submit the task.
